select a.*,b.employee_name,b.job_number,b.post,c.name as deptName from wk_hrm_attendance_clock a left join wk_hrm_employee b on a.clock_employee_id = b.employee_id left join wk_hrm_dept c on b.dept_id = c.dept_id where b.is_del = 0
and b.dept_id = #{data.deptId}
and date_format(a.clock_time,'%Y-%m') = date_format(#{data.date},'%Y-%m')
and (b.employee_name like concat('%',#{data.search},'%') or b.job_number like concat('%',#{data.search},'%'))
and a.clock_employee_id in
#{employeeId}
and 1=2
order by a.clock_time,a.clock_employee_id desc
